WhatCanDo: ^What can I do for you youngster?
^What can you tell me about this city?
^I’m looking for keys to the gate.
AboutTheCity: ^Hazy City is famous for its giant walls protecting it from what’s beyond the mountains...
^A Giant Abomination of gears and flesh, created by a very foolish man...
^Although it’s been many years, I know It is still out there, waiting for us to put our guards down...
LookingForKey: ^I’ve seen that peddler carry one around…
LookingAtStatue: ^That statue reminds me of an old friend…
^His heart was always for the people…
